Container.Name: ACNH Forecast
Container.Overview: ACNH Forecast is a weather prediction tool for Animal Crossing: New Horizons. [br][br] Configure the container port, environment variables, and persistent data folder as needed.

Config.Name: NGINX_VERSION
Config.Description: Version of Nginx to use. Change if you need a different version.

Config.Name: PKG_RELEASE
Config.Description: Package release number for Nginx. Usually defaults to 1.

Config.Name: DYNPKG_RELEASE
Config.Description: Dynamic package release for Nginx modules.

Config.Name: NJS_RELEASE
Config.Description: Release number for Nginx JS module.

Config.Name: Community_Applications_Conversion
Config.Description: Internal variable used by Community Applications. Do not change unless instructed.

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Container Path: /config Folder to persist ACNH Forecast configuration and data.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: HTTP port for ACNH Forecast web interface. Default maps host port 3334 to container port 80.
